Fine wine investment has delivered annual returns between 10%-14% over the last 30 years. The market is expected to grow +54% by 2024 reaching $7.8 billion. Not only is wine profitable, but it’s a relatively safe and stable way to diversify your investment portfolio.

We guarantee the provenance of all wines by sourcing directly from the producers and négociants. Quelques définitions :
Distributeur : personne physique ou morale inscrite au Registre du Commerce et du Crédit Mobilier, signataire du présent Contrat et agréée par OFMS au titre des présentes pour effectuer les opérations pour les clients.

Transfert : Consiste à l’envoi de monnaie électronique entre 2 distributeurs

FAQ:
Can I invest in Vinovest if I don't live in the US?
Yes, Vinovest is available to anyone who can legally purchase alcohol.

What is the minimum amount I need to invest?
There is no minimum deposit amount to start a trading portfolio. The minimum to open a managed portfolio is $1,000

What methods of payment does Vinovest accept?
Vinovest accepts bank transfers, credit cards, wire transfers, paper checks, and cryptocurrencies.

What are the management fees associated with my Vinovest account?
The management fee depends on your investment tier. The current fee structure is as follows:
     · Standard Tier - 2.85%

     · Premier Tier - 2.5%
     · Grand Cru Tier - 2.25%
The fee covers insurance, storage, authentication, and active management of your portfolio. Fees are prorated across the year and only charged on the invested capital in your account.

How liquid is my portfolio?
100%, of course (sorry, we had to get that out of our systems.). You can sell your wine at any time. Vinovest has an extensive network of wine traders and merchants worldwide. Using this network, we can sell your wine in 2-3 weeks.

Can Vinovest ship wines in my portfolio to my home address?
Yes, we can ship bottles from your portfolio directly to your home (or any other address that wine can legally be shipped to).
